thread.title_full: 2Way Supply Advises Nursery and Garden Product Businesses on Efficiency, Customer Service and ROI Benefits of New Motorola DLR Digital Two-Way Radios

author: KEN BRASWELL
title: 2Way Supply Advises Nursery and Garden Product Businesses on Efficiency, Customer Service and ROI Benefits of New Motorola DLR Digital Two-Way Radios
text:
2Way Supply , a leading Motorola distributor, is advising nursery and garden product operations on the efficiency, customer service and ROI benefits of the new Motorola DLR Digital Two-Way radios. “Demand for nursery and garden products has recovered well since the economic downturn a few years ago, but intense competition is forcing businesses to be more efficient and provide improved levels of customer service,” commented Ken Braswell, the owner of 2Way Supply. “The Motorola DLR Digital two-way radios are an ideal communication tool to help achieve both of these critical objectives.”
According to Braswell and his team at 2Way Supply, there are four key categories of benefits that are the most advantageous to nursery and garden product businesses: extended coverage, low TCO, rugged design and convenience.
COVERAGE: The new Motorola DLR Digital two-way radios deliver clear communications indoors or outdoors covering up to 300,000 square feet/20 floors -- or up to 600,000 square feet with the optional extender. They also operate in the 900 MHz ISM, which allow staff to enjoy clear, static-free communication across an extended range. As such, staff can respond immediately to customer inquiries or provide real-time information on stock/inventory levels, etc.
LOW TCO: nursery and garden product businesses will not need to cover regulatory licenses and administrative fees.
DESIGN: The new Motorola DLR Digital two-way radios are designed to withstand rigorous outdoor use, unlike smartphones that can be vulnerable to scratching and breakage. The radios feature sleek and lightweight design that allows staff to wear it conveniently on their belt or carry in their pocket.
CONVENIENCE: The new Motorola DLR Digital two-way are designed for easy operation, and use voice prompts that allow staff to simply pick up a radio and start communicating immediately. They also feature 14-hour battery life and easy recharging in their individual charging units (multi-unit chargers that charge up to 12 radios at a time are also available),
Other key features include the use of hopping technology to continually change frequencies, private reply, direct call, call all available, instant mute, talk permit tones, home channel, and advanced configuration menus.
More information on the groundbreaking new DLR Digital two-way radios can be found on the 2Way Supply website: http://2waysupply.com
About 2Way Supply
2Way Supply is an authorized Motorola dealer specializing in Motorola 2Way radios, parts and accessories. It is a wholly owned subsidiary and a Texas based business. 2Way Supply (2waysupply.com) serves as an easy-to-use e-commerce site for Motorola 2Way radios and accessories and features low prices on a great selection of needed items for retail establishments as well as industrial, entertainment, sports, property management, construction, safety, and business clients.
